q: you can only use rd command only if the subdirectory is *not* empty.
xcopy is an external command that lets you copy the all the file inside a subdirectory including the subdirectory to the location you specify.
It is an internal DOS command used to create a subdirectory.
It is an internal DOS command used to display the list of files in your current working directory.

fruits
vitc
meat
animal.txt
apple.txt
banana.txt
orange.txt
-vitc
-veggies
saying.txt
Given the directory structure above, in one command line from the root directory, write a command to create the subdirectory vitc (under meat).
in the xcopy dos command, you can use /s switch to copy all the files inside a subdirectory including all the subdirectories even it is *not* empty.
it is a dos command that lets you display the directory structure in your current working directory
It is the extension name for assembly language program created using DEBUG command.
It is the hexadecimal value of (capital letter) A.
It is a general purpose register used as data register.

Simulate the given program below:
0123:0100 mov dl,32
0123:0102 int 21
0123:0104 mov dl,30
0123:0108 int 21
0123:010A mov dl,32
0123:010C int 21
0123:010E mov dl,30
0123:0110 int 21
0123:0112 int 20
What is the output?

Simulate the given program below:
0123:0100 mov ah,02
0123:0102 mov dl,50
0123:0104 int 21
0123:0106 int 20
What is the output?

Simulate the given program below:
0123:0100 mov ah,02
0123:0102 mov dl,41
0123:0104 int 21
0123:0106 int 20
What is the output?
It is a general purpose register used as accumulator.

Simulate the given program below:
0123:0100 mov ah,02
0123:0102 mov dl,32
0123:0104 int 21
0123:0114 in 20
What is the output?
It is a general purpose register as base register.
It is a debug command that let you exit from the debug function and go back the the DOS prompt.
It is where the execution of most operations takes place.
What does C mean in CU?
It is one of the tangible parts of a computer system.
It is program that run the computer, designed to perform a particular type of task.
Software serves as an interpreter between the hardware and the user of the system.
It is one of the intangible parts of a computer system
IT is a program is a sequence of extremely simple instructions in binary which are not easy to understand.
It is an electronic device that accepts, processes, stores, and outputs data at high speeds according to programmed instructions.
